about_the_game:
Set the stage for an old-fashioned asylum story or create a more modern jail to house your most evil villains with the Gothic Prison tileset for RPG Maker!

The Gothic Prison tileset includes (in dark, light, and grunge versions of dark and light):

Grass, dirt, tall grass, vines and other ground tiles
Tile floor (one decorative, one plain)
Concrete floor
Grate floor
Autotile fence
Cracks and rubble

Walls (in same four options as above):

Walls to match floors, plus another style of concrete wall and brick wall
Gray-purple roofing tiles
Autotile windows (dark and light)
Mossy walls

Also included (in same four options as above):

Prison bars (adjustable height) and other prison cell tiles
Beds/gurneys
Medical supplies (IV, oxygen tanks, blood pressure monitor, clip boards, test tubes, stethoscope, scalpels, surgery lights, etc)
Electric chairs
Office tiles – filing cabinets, shelves, lockers, desks, etc
Cleaning supplies
Kitchen tiles – fridge/freezer, stove, griddle/grill, plates and pots, range hoods, cabinets, etc
Decorative corners and angled walls
Grates and barred windows
Stairs, plain and fancy
Catwalk
Boilers and pipe system
Trees and rocks
Fancy stairs, torches, windows, door, gates, signs and razor-wire fences
and more!


Events and Animations

Prison doors (multiple variations)
Large gate opening
Switches, levers and valves
Prison bus
